verses.text: Whoso \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but he that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \add is\add* \w brutish|strong="H1198"\w*.

A \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add man\add* \w obtaineth|strong="H6329"\w* \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of wicked \w devices|strong="H4209"\w* will he \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*.

A \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall not be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* by \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: but the \w root|strong="H8328"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

A \w virtuous|strong="H2428"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \add is\add* a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* to her \w husband|strong="H1167"\w*: but she that maketh \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \add is\add* as \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w* in his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

The \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add are\add* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*: \add but\add* the \w counsels|strong="H8458"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add are\add* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add are\add* to lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them.
The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* are \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w*, and \add are\add* not: but the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*.

A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be \w commended|strong="H1984"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w wisdom|strong="H7922"\w*: but he that is of a \w perverse|strong="H5753"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall be \w despised|strong="H0937"\w*.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft of a…: Heb. perverse of heart\f*

\add He that is\add* \w despised|strong="H7034"\w*, and hath a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than he that \w honoureth|strong="H3513"\w* himself, and \w lacketh|strong="H2638"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

A \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* \w regardeth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of his \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: but the tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add are\add* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft tender…: or, bowels\f*

He that \w tilleth|strong="H5647"\w* his \w land|strong="H0127"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: but he that \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* \w vain|strong="H7386"\w* \add persons is\add* \w void|strong="H2638"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w desireth|strong="H2530"\w* the \w net|strong="H4685"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add men:\add* but the \w root|strong="H8328"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w yieldeth|strong="H5414"\w* \add fruit\add*.\f + \fr 12.12 \ft the net: or, the fortress\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* is \w snared|strong="H4170"\w* by the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of \add his\add* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: but the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* shall come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft The wicked…: Heb. The snare of the wicked is in the transgression of lips\f*

A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w good|strong="H2896"\w* by the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of \add his\add* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: and the \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w* of a \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w rendered|strong="H7725"\w* unto him.

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* \add is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: but he that \w hearkeneth|strong="H8085"\w* unto \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*.

A \w fool’s|strong="H0191"\w* \w wrath|strong="H3708"\w* is \w presently|strong="H3117"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: but a \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add man\add* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft presently: Heb. in that day\f*

\add He that\add* \w speaketh|strong="H6315"\w* \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* sheweth \w forth|strong="H5046"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: but a \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* that \w speaketh|strong="H0981"\w* like the \w piercings|strong="H4094"\w* of a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: but the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add is\add* \w health|strong="H4832"\w*.

The \w lip|strong="H8193"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: but a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* but for a \w moment|strong="H7280"\w*.

\w Deceit|strong="H4820"\w* \add is\add* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of them that \w imagine|strong="H2790"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: but to the \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add is\add* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

There shall no \w evil|strong="H0205"\w* \w happen|strong="H0579"\w* to the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add are\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but they that \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w truly|strong="H0530"\w* \add are\add* his \w delight|strong="H7522"\w*.

A \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w concealeth|strong="H3680"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w proclaimeth|strong="H7121"\w* \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w*.

The \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w diligent|strong="H2742"\w* shall bear \w rule|strong="H4910"\w*: but the \w slothful|strong="H7423"\w* shall be under \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*.\f + \fr 12.24 \ft slothful: or, deceitful\f*

\w Heaviness|strong="H1674"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w* maketh it \w stoop|strong="H7812"\w*: but a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* maketh it \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* more \w excellent|strong="H8446"\w* than his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: but the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w seduceth|strong="H8582"\w* them.\f + \fr 12.26 \ft excellent: or, abundant\f*

The \w slothful|strong="H7423"\w* \add man\add* \w roasteth|strong="H2760"\w* not that which he took in \w hunting|strong="H6718"\w*: but the \w substance|strong="H1952"\w* of a \w diligent|strong="H2742"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add is\add* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w*.

In the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add is\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; and \add in\add* the \w pathway|strong="H5410"\w* \add thereof there is\add* no \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
